title: It Stalked the Ocean Floor (1954) Up from the forbidden depths comes a Tidal Wave Of Terror!

sources.title: It Stalked the Ocean Floor (1954) Up from the forbidden depths comes a Tidal Wave Of Terror!
sources.description:
Monster from the Ocean Floor is an American 1954 science fiction film about a sea monster that terrorizes a Mexican cove. The film was directed by Wyott Ordung and produced by Roger Corman.

Black & White version:  https://youtu.be/eZwcLIDchGI

Synopsis:
Julie, an American on vacation in Mexico, spots a giant, one-eyed monster rising from the ocean, but when she tries to tell the authorities, no one believes her. She finally teams up with Steve, a marine biologist in an attempt to destroy it.

Main Cast:
Anne Kimbell - Julie Blair
Stuart Wade - Steve Dunning
Dick Pinner - Dr. Baldwin
Wyott Ordung - Pablo
Inez Palange - Tula
Jonathan Haze - Joe
David Garcia - Jose
Roger Corman - Tommy


00:00 - Full movie with subtitles
00:48 - Julie learns about the mysterious legends surrounding the bay from the locals.
05:45 - Steve introduces himself as a marine biologist and invites Julie to explore his submarine.
10:53 - A diver mysteriously vanishes, leaving only his suit behind, sparking fear of a sea monster.
21:22 - Julie encounters a giant octopus, fueling her belief in the bay's monstrous secrets.
31:12 - Julie connects the monster's origins to post-war nuclear testing in 1946.
50:35 - Steve and Dr. Baldwin analyze a strange tissue sample, suspecting a giant amoeba.
59:53 - Julie risks her life to confront the monster, leading to a tense underwater rescue.
1:03:20 - Steve apologizes to Julie, acknowledging her bravery and the truth about the monster.

@CultCinemaClassics
